DOC.brief_summary: Several case report show co-infection Mycoplasma pneumoniae patient pulmonary tuberculosis . The aim study elucidate prevalence clinical significance co-infection Mycoplasma pneumonia patient newly diagnose pulmonary tuberculosis .
